mapper.insert: insert into user(user_id, user_pass, user_name, user_tel, user_email) values(#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userName}, #{userTel}, #{userEmail});
mapper.select: select count(user_id) from user where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into identification(tel, code, expire) values(#{tel}, #{code}, date_add(now(), INTERVAL 3 MINUTE));
mapper.update: update identification set code = #{code}, expire_time = date_add(now(), INTERVAL 3 MINUTE);
